metadata.title: CVE-2021-21258 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is an open-source asset and IT management software package thatprovides ITIL Service Desk features, licenses tracking and softwareauditing. In GLPI from version 9.5.0 and before version 9.5.4, there is across-site scripting injection vulnerability when using ajax/kanban.php.This is fixed in version 9.5.4.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
